original_title: Sri Lanka cuts petrol to Rs311, diesel to Rs283, Sinopec Rs280
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has cut petrol price by 21 rupees to 311 rupees a litre and diesel by 24 rupees to 283 rupees, from midnight on September 30.
Kerosene was cut by 19 rupees to 183 rupees. (Colombo/Oct01/2024)
